PROFILE
Energetic and motivated programmer/analyst with nine years experience looking for a new opportunity.

I master complex systems and ideas quickly, and love to be challenged by difficult problems. I enjoy communicating and collaborating with diverse groups of people, and have experience interfacing with technical and non-technical clients.
EXPERIENCE
STAY AT HOME PARENT 2006-Current

Had twins, decided to stay at home.

  • Basic and advanced parenting duties
  • Volunteer work tutoring early reading, algebra, trigonometry, geometry, and pre-calculus
  • Volunteer with school committees and Cub Scouts
  • Self-taught electrical to re-wire house (aluminum wiring)
  • Self-taught plumbing (replumb all baths), woodworking (cabinetry, flooring)
PROGRAMMER ANALYST, CASE LOGIC: BOULDER, CO - 2001-2006

End-to-end development on IBM iSeries in RPGLE / CLLE with RPG free and embedded SQL. EDI development and troubleshooting. Maintenance and process improvements, large releases and projects. Worked closely with users, differing departments, and management. Interfaced with SYNON code, used Turnover, ROBOT, DBU, WDSC (older version of RDi - Rational Development for i)

FREELANCE SOFTWARE ENGINEER, CARGILL: MINNETONKA, MN - 2001

Short term contract work after company (Cargill) reached out. RPGLE and CLLE development, troubleshooting and maintenance.

CONSULTANT/PROGRAMMER ANALYST, CARGILL: MINNETONKA, MN - 1999-2000

Short term Y2K contract work after company (Cargill) reached out. Analyzed RPGLE and CLLE code for vulnerabilities, documented and prepared solutions.

SOFTWARE ENGINEER, PROJECT TECHNICAL LEAD, (KEANE) CARGILL: MINNETONKA, MN - 1995-1999

End-to-end development in RPGLE, RPG free with CLLE. Responsible for development and maintenance of a manufacturing and accounting system to support worldwide operations in Cargill's Animal Nutrition division. Worked directly with Accounting and Management as well as users across the globe. Advised and assisted technical programmers in Europe, Asia and South America with problems, updates and enhancements. Responsible for development from user requirements to implementation worldwide. System interface to ERP JDEdwards, used ROBOT, Aldon, DBU.

Last two years spent as a project manager/technical team lead for consulting group in addition to all other duties.

EDUCATION

University of Minnesota (Twin Cities), Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
